params.credentialHash: A unique hash representing the credential details
params.expirationPeriod: Duration in seconds for credential validity
params.subject: The address of the credential subject

returns.credentialId: Unique identifier for the issued credential

params.credentialId: Unique identifier of the credential to revoke

returns.isValid: Whether the credential is currently valid

getCredentialsByIssuer(address).notice: Get credentials issued by a specific issuer

getCredentialsForSubject(address).notice: Get credentials issued to a specific subject
